lead_paragraph: Coming to Houston this week with hopes of another national championship is North Carolina, a school embroiled in one of the biggest NCAA academic scandals ever for enrolling athletes in sham classes and having tutors write their papers to keep them eligible.

headline.print_headline: Column: Final Four Matchup as Much About Scandals as Baskets
headline.main: Column: Final Four Matchup as Much About Scandals as Baskets
